Probation Will End Suddenly, Unexpectedly 

     When Jesus ceases to plead for man, the cases of all are forever decided. . . . Probation closes; Christ's 
                                                                           230
intercessions cease in heaven. This time finally comes suddenly upon all, and those who have neglected to purify their souls by obeying the truth are found sleeping.--2T 191 (1868).
